title: Shameik Moore, Susan Sarandon and D'Arcy Carden on making the off-the-wall Lester Brothers comedy 'The Gutter'
description: Shameik Moore, Susan Sarandon and D'Arcy Carden are joined by Yassir and Isaiah Lester in breaking down how this wild film came together.
excerpt: "This is the most batshit, insane script I've ever read."
text: "This is the most batshit, insane script I've ever read." Shameik Moore, Susan Sarandon and D'Arcy Carden are joined by Yassir and Isaiah Lester in breaking down how The Gutter came together.The Gutter is now in theaters and on demand. Kristy Puchko is the Film Editor at Mashable. Based in New York City, she's an established film critic and entertainment reporter, who has traveled the world on assignment, covered a variety of film festivals, co-hosted movie-focused podcasts, interviewed a wide array of performers and filmmakers, and had her work published on RogerEbert.com, Vanity Fair, and The Guardian. A member of the Critics Choice Association and GALECA as well as a Top Critic on Rotten Tomatoes, Kristy's primary focus is movies. However, she's also been known to gush over television, podcasts, and board games. You can follow her on Twitter. This newsletter may contain advertising, deals, or affiliate links. html:
"This is the most batshit, insane script I've ever read."

Shameik Moore, Susan Sarandon and D'Arcy Carden are joined by Yassir and Isaiah Lester in breaking down how The Gutter came together.

The Gutter is now in theaters and on demand.

Kristy Puchko is the Film Editor at Mashable. Based in New York City, she's an established film critic and entertainment reporter, who has traveled the world on assignment, covered a variety of film festivals, co-hosted movie-focused podcasts, interviewed a wide array of performers and filmmakers, and had her work published on RogerEbert.com, Vanity Fair, and The Guardian. A member of the Critics Choice Association and GALECA as well as a Top Critic on Rotten Tomatoes, Kristy's primary focus is movies. However, she's also been known to gush over television, podcasts, and board games. You can follow her on Twitter.
